titles.title: En garderie | Comme la fleur, la femme ne bourgeonne que si on l’arrose
The Rocking Cradle / She`s a Garden Peony When She Stands Up, a Mountain Peony When She Sits Down, and a Round-leaved Sundew When She Shows Her Naughty Side
Yurikago / Tateba Shakuyaku Suwareba Botan Midareru Sugata wa Mousengoke
揺籃 / 立てば芍薬座れば牡丹淫れる姿は毛氈苔
